conbody.p: The data elements stored in is accessed by querying the system. Access can be made in a number of ways.

ul.li: You can locate and download the original data object using the Object Browser.

li.p: You can query a data collection or dataset using the PHEMI .
You can create a dataset and download it into Excel, CSV, or TSV format.
You can export a dataset to a portal, tool, or application, using the or a JDBC/ODBC connector.
You can export a dataset to SAP HANA using the SAP Smart Data Access connector.

conbody.p: In all cases, 's Policy Enforcement Engine strictly enforces your organizationâ€™s privacy and security policies to ensure rightful access to data.
